title: Building Better Shelters
description1: We've designed this guide to help anyone create safer, more durable living spaces using accessible materials and techniques.
description2: Whether you're building your own shelter, helping others, or just exploring possibilities - we're here to support your journey.
suggestionDescription: The main goal of the website is to provide useful advice to those who are trying to build a habitable shelter for themselves. We've tailored resources for different needs. Select the option that best represents your situation.

principles.title: Principles
principles.description: In the PRINCIPLES section, you can read general information about, for example, the fundamental role of waterproofing and thermal insulation.

materials.title: Materials
materials.description: Under the MATERIALS menu item, you can find information about the possible uses of some important raw materials.

plan.title: Plans
plan.description: The most useful part - the PLANS menu item offers specific suggestions to improve shelters. Choose and print plans as booklets.

contribute.title: Contribute
contribute.description: If you have a usable idea that you would like to share with others, use the CONTRIBUTE menu item. Create a drawing or photo montage of your plan and upload it with a short description so that others can benefit from it.
contribute.review: (Uploaded materials will appear on the platform after professional review.)
